statements.select:
select a.bill_kind_id, a.bill_kind_code, a.money_flag, a.create_url, a.modify_url, a.query_url, a.approve_url, a.bill_kind_name as bill_kind_name from t_def_bill_kind a
order by a.display_index
select a.bill_kind_id, a.bill_kind_code, a.money_flag, a.create_url, a.modify_url, a.query_url, a.approve_url, a.bill_kind_name from t_def_bill_kind a where a.bill_kind_id=#BillKindId#

select a.bill_kind_id, a.bill_kind_code, a.money_flag, a.create_url, a.modify_url, a.query_url, a.approve_url, a.bill_kind_name from t_def_bill_kind a
where a.bill_kind_code=#BillKindCode#
select b.query_url from t_bill a inner join t_def_bill_kind b on b.bill_kind_id=a.bill_kind_id where a.bill_id=#value#
